title: Philippe Leclerc de Hauteclocque
summary: Philippe François Marie Leclerc de Hauteclocque[lower-alpha 2][lower-alpha 3] (22 November 1902 – 28 November 1947) was a Free-French general during the Second World War. He became Marshal of France posthumously in 1952, and is known in France simply as le maréchal Leclerc or just Leclerc.
